ly.img.android.pesdk.utils

Class TransparentJpeg

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly.img.android.pesdk.utils.TransparentJpeg

  • public class TransparentJpeg
extends java.lang.Object
    A lib that saves an ARGB Bitmap separated as RGB an Alpha Chanel in separate jpeg files.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • saveTransparentJpeg

        public static boolean saveTransparentJpeg(java.io.File dir,
                                          java.lang.String filename,
                                          android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Save ARGB Bitmap in two JPEG files
        Parameters:
        dir - saveImage directory
        filename - the filename prefix
        bitmap - the bitmap that should be saved
        Returns:
        true if saving is successful, false if the files can not be written

      • saveTransparentJpeg

                                          java.lang.String filename,
                                          GlRawBitmap glRawBitmap)
        Save ARGB Bitmap in two JPEG files
        Parameters:
        dir - saveImage directory
        filename - the filename prefix
        glRawBitmap - the glBitmap data that should be saved
        Returns:
        true if saving is successful, false if the files can not be written

        filename - the filename prefix

      • combinationExists

        public static boolean combinationExists(java.io.File dir,
                                        java.lang.String filename,
                                        boolean cleanupIfNot)
        Check if the RGB and ALPHA channel's exists
        Parameters:
        dir - saveImage directory
        filename - the filename prefix
        cleanupIfNot - delete the second channel if the other not present
        Returns:
        true, if the RGB and ALPHA channel is present.

      • loadTransparentJpeg

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap loadTransparentJpeg(java.io.File dir,
                                                          java.lang.String filename)
        Load the RGB and ALPHA channel and combine them into one Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        dir - saveImage directory
        filename - the filename prefix
        Returns:
        the resulting bitmap in ARGB_8888

      • combineColorWithMask

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap combineColorWithMask(@NonNull
                                                           android.graphics.Bitmap rgbBitmap,
                                                           @NonNull
                                                           android.graphics.Bitmap maskBitmap)
        Load the RGB and ALPHA channel and combine them into one Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        rgbBitmap - RGB color informations ARGB_8888[COLOR + A=255]
        maskBitmap - BW mask alpha informations ARGB_8888[(R=G=B + A=255)]
        Returns:
        the resulting bitmap in ARGB_8888
